reviews.review: Buy it for the memories, keep playing it for the zm_escape servers.
amazing gameplay old game but nice graphics!

Даже сегодня соурс не уступает позиции кс го. Ясно, что кс го набрал обороты, народ гоняет во всю, но и в соурс продолжают гонять толпами. Во-первых понравилась графика и физика, во-вторых то, что все детально просчитано, особенно стрельба. 1.5 и 1.6 отдыхают. Переработанные карты, просто красота. Отлияная игра, гоняю по сей день

There’s a reason why Counter-Strike: Source still has a relatively active following to this day. Many will argue that it in fact surpasses Global Offensive when it comes to gameplay and mods, and you’d be right. Source is timeless in a way that Global Offensive could only dream of being (especially considering how much of a trainwreck GO was at launch), and I’m sure that if and when the community finally dies off, it’ll be a sad day indeed for CS fans. But for now, if you don’t own this game (especially those of you who play GMOD), get it! It’s great fun (you don’t have to pirate the assets to play TTT either) with all the various community gamemodes, and I’m sure there’s still more to come for CSS despite its age.

Probably hundreds or even thousands of hours were spent on this masterpiece back then when I didn't have internet connection, so I were playing with bots in 99% till I got the internet and started playing on servers. Back then when it was came out the graphics were so good for us, it was AMAZING that we left speechless. I remember we (I mean everyone who went to internet clubs back then when most peopel didn't have PCs) used to play in Chateau just to see smooth water graphics and deliberately throw a grenade just to see how it splashes. Also, in previous versions of this game there was a watermelon on the roof of the building in Assault. It was fun to break it whether it is via gun or dropping from the roof.
